short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Pickle Plugin provides a daily reminder to switch off and enjoy a proper lunchtime, and maybe even a cheese and pickle sandwich.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop work eating your lunch!
73% of us never take a proper lunch break.
It's time to take back lunchtime.

The Pickle Plugin makes it almost impossible for you and your co-workers to 'forget' to take a lunch break again. Becoming a daily reminder to switch off and enjoy a proper lunchtime, and maybe even a cheese and pickle sandwich.
